meaningMnemonic: I have <radical>sick</radical> in my <radical>skin</radical>. Just look at it, it doesn't look too good. Whenever I have sickness in my skin, I know that I'm probably <kanji>tired</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Why so <kanji>tired</kanji>? Your body is <reading>hea</reading>ted (ひ) up from exercising way too much. You should let that heat cool down so your skin starts looking better.
